ack.p: We would like to thank all members of the Department for Infectious Disease Epidemiology, RKI for useful discussions, expert consultations and for taking part in the pathogens' scoring: C. Adlhoch, M.Altmann, K.Alpers, M.Askar, K.Atzpodien, B. Bartmeyer, H.Bernard, J.Benzler, J. Bielecke, B.Brodhun, U.Buchholz, W.Cai, S.Dudareva, M.Faber, G.Falkenhorst, L.Fiebig, C.Frank, B.Greutélaers, M.Dehnert, W.Haas, B.Hauer, W.Hellenbrand, J.Hermes, M.Kang, J.Koch, K.Köpke, S.Lassen, G.Laude, U.Marcus, D.Matysiak-Klose, A.Milde-Busch, M.Nachtnebel, S.Nielsen, I.Noll, R.Offergeld, S.Reiter, C.Remschmidt, A.Reuß, U.Rexroth, T.Rieck, B.Rosner, I.Schöneberg, B.Schweickert, A.Siedler, P. Stöcker, T.Süß, A.Takla, B.Ultsch, E.Velasco, L.Voß, M.Wadl, B.Weiss, D.Werber, H.Wilking, and R.Zimmermann.
We thank as well all colleagues who took part in the weighting procedure and Blair Prochnow for editorial support in the finalization of the manuscript.
